item.description:
Please join us as we get back in the swing with our monthly potlucks, this time at Urban Farm Fermentory on Anderson Street in Portland. This will be a loosely organized event with a big focus on our traditionally delectable potluck (starting at 6:30) followed by a bit of show-and-tell about the host site and then socializing to follow.

Bring a dish or beverage to share and your potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin).
item.how_to_find_us: This is next to the Zero Station building. Ample parking.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: July Meetup: Potluck + Social at Urban Farm Fermentory
